title: 107_s1960
content: Biobased Energy Incentive Act of 2002 - Amends the Biomass Research and Development Act of 2000 to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to establish: (1) a biobased energy incentive program of payments to eligible producers to promote the use of commodities to produce biobased energy products. And (2) a program to encourage wider availability of biobased energy products to consumers of gasoline and diesel fuel.
